data.actual_result: Member list never loads until you scroll around the member list
data.expected_result: Member list of the newly switched server should load
data.short_description: If you switch servers while member list is open, the member list will never load
data.steps_to_repro: - Open both channel drawer and member list at the same time by tapping on both buttons simultaneously  - Wait for member list to load - Switch to another server using the other drawer
